page.title: 10DUNNICK'S MEAD GARAGE
page.content: {DUNNICK'S MEAD GARAGE {OWNER:}MR RATCLIFFE. {GENERAL:}THE GARAGE OPENED EARLY 1930,s MR RATCLIFFE HAS OWNED THE GARAGE 25 YEARS, 6 WORKERS WORK AT THE GARAGE, 25 % OF TRADE IS WITH FARMERS.{ {PETROL:}PETROL FROM BRIDGWATER,PETROL SOLD A MONTH IS 2000 GALLONS,MOST PETROL SOLD IN THE SUMMER HOLIDAYS AND ON FRIDAYS AND SATURDAYS, HE SELLS DERV BUT NOT MUCH. {CAR SALES:}16 CARS IN STOCK,12 ARE 3 TO 6 YEARS OLD,12 CARS ARE SOLD PER MONTH MOST POPULAR CAR SOLD IS A HATCHBACK TYPE. {WORKSHOP:}THE MOST COMMON FAULT:IS THE EXHAUST, NOT MUCH FARM MACHINERY IS REPAIRED, HE GETS SPARE PARTS FROM WESTON,THE WORKSHOP IS HIS BUSIEST PART OF HIS CAR BUSINESS
